price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߞߎ߲߬ߠߊ߬ߝߎߟߋ߲ߣߍ߲ ߕߎ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߞߎ߬ߙߎ ߟߎ߬ ߟߛߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߓߏ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَكَانُواْ يَنۡحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wakānū yanḥitūna mina al-jibāli buyūtan āminīna
